q: Al Jazeera reports suggested the monuments of Saqqara-- a large burial ground of Ancient Egypt referred to as the`` City of the Dead''-- had been damaged and that items were stolen, Zahi Hawass wrote. This is not true. In fact, while the break-in at the Egyptian Museum on Friday( Jan. 28) resulted in 70 broken objects( all of which will be restored), Zahi Hawass said all of the Egyptian monuments are

milestone for Gabrielle Giffords . Shortly before the service, surrounded by her husband Mark Kelson , Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi and her close friends Rep. Debbie Wasserman Schultz ( D-Fla.) and Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.), she opened her eyes. She's in her hospital bed. I'm holding her hand, we're talking about how great she is and how inspiring she is. And we're talking about all the fun things we want to do. And she's squeezing my hand and I'm knowing that she's reacting. She's moving her leg and she's moving her arms. And we're getting so excited because we can see that she's really trying so hard to communicate with us. Dr. Michael Lemole, the neurosurgeon who operated on Gabrielle Giffords , said Thursday that visit may have made all the difference.`` I was there when she was surrounded by her friends from the Congress

by one with a technical free throw off an illegal defense, but George Lynch answered with a short jumper over Shawn Bradley . The basket gave the 76ers a 99-98 lead, their first since midway through the third quarter. I went to the basket strong and shielded him off with my body, said George Lynch , who is eight inches shorter than Shawn Bradley . New All-Star Michael Finley answered with a jumper at 28.4 seconds and appeared to be the hero again for Dallas when he snagged a rebound of Allen Iverson 's miss.

Eric Schmidt niet bij Google, maar zal hij in april als onderhandelaar voor het bedrijf gaan functioneren. Aan de capaciteiten van Larry Page om een van's werelds grootste bedrijven te leiden, wordt door kenners openlijk getwijfeld. Ik vraag me af of Google de beste plek is om als topman je carri?re te beginnen , zegt Gartner-analist Alan Weiner.`` Met zekerheid kan ik zeggen dat als Larry Page ergens anders naar de positie van ceo had gesolliciteerd, hij de baan niet zou hebben gekregen.'' While Eric Schmidt travels the world meeting with business partners, government officials and potential takeover targets, Larry Page says he will be making most of the big decisions as he tries to rekindle the soul and passion of a startup. . That's right, Steve Ballmer is responsible for placing so many sales and marketing execs in key management positions and allowing them to appoint others. According to the Bloomberg story, by reporter Dina Bass, Steve Ballmer plans to extend a management shake-up aimed at adding senior product executives with an engineering background. Bass is a veteran reporter who has covered Microsoft for many years, and she typically has impeccable sourcing. Her report is believable. The questions: Why? Why now? The two answers are intertwined
